source: TEXT_GAIUSC107_00958_SEQ_00<tab>A rolling stone such as yourself will surely find some business in common with a fellow called Floating Stone, if you would but speak to the miner.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC107_00958_SEQ_00<tab>採掘師フローティング・ストーンは、冒険者に集めてきてほしいものがあるようだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC107_00958_SEQ_01<tab>The area surrounding Burgundy Falls has a unique species of coblyn called the quartz doblyn, found only in certain parts of Thanalan. Floating Stone bids you slay five of these rare creatures for the sole purpose of harvesting clear quartz from them.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC107_00958_SEQ_01<tab>バーニングウォールに生息する変種のコブラン「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2011301 /var>」を5体討伐し「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E876801 /var>」を入手しよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC107_00958_SEQ_02<tab>You have enough clear quartz to satisfy Floating Stone's thirst for crystals. Return to Burgundy Falls and deliver them to the Roegadyn miner.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC107_00958_SEQ_02<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E876801 /var>を入手した。バーガンディ滝にいる採掘師「フローティング・ストーン」に渡そう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC107_00958_SEQ_03<tab>Floating Stone seems less than heartbroken by the Calamity, which makes a refreshing change from nearly everybody else on the subject. The hills are still a candy shop, and he a child with a sweet tooth and a pickaxe...
target: TEXT_GAIUSC107_00958_SEQ_03<tab>第七霊災の影響で、バーニングウォール周辺の環境は変わってしまったそうだ。しかし、希少な鉱物の眠るこの場所は、採掘師にとっては宝の山であるらしい。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC107_00958_TODO_00<tab>Slay quartz doblyns and obtain clear quartz.
TEXT_GAIUSC107_00958_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the clear quartz to Floating Stone.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC107_00958_TODO_01<tab>フローティング・ストーンに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E876801 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_GAIUSC107_00958_FLOATINGSTONE_000_000<tab>You know about quartz doblyns? Didn't expect you to; they're only found in the most dangerous reaches of Thanalan. Type of coblyn they are, just kind of...crunchier.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC107_00958_FLOATINGSTONE_000_000あんた「」って知っとるか？
このバーニングウォールにしか生息していない、
コブランの変種なんだがね。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC107_00958_FLOATINGSTONE_000_001<tab>Oh, yes, they eat crystals, you know, and 'round these parts, there's a king's feast to be had. Makes the doblyns grow pure, clear quartz right in their bodies. Think you can get some for me?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC107_00958_FLOATINGSTONE_000_001ヤツら、豊富なクリスタルを食っているから、
希少な「」を体に蓄えてやがるんだ。
わしの代わりに採ってきてもらえねえかね。
TEXT_GAIUSC107_00958_DUMMY_000_000<tab>クォーツドブラン5体倒して「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E876801 /var>」をゲット

source: TEXT_GAIUSC107_00958_FLOATINGSTONE_000_010<tab>Good huntin'? Bag any clear quartz there?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC107_00958_FLOATINGSTONE_000_010どうだったね？
「」は採れたかね？

source: TEXT_GAIUSC107_00958_FLOATINGSTONE_000_020<tab>Them's what I was after! Clear as a god's piss─no offense intended─and a ring like a bell's.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC107_00958_FLOATINGSTONE_000_020そうそう、これだよ。
さすがに、いい色をしてやがるね。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC107_00958_FLOATINGSTONE_000_021<tab>The Calamity's changed a lot of things 'round here, that's true enough, but it's still a treasure trove. You can't ask for much more as a miner!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC107_00958_FLOATINGSTONE_000_021第七霊災からこっち、ここらもだいぶ変わっちまった。
それでもまぁ、希少な鉱物が眠っとるから、
採掘師のわしらにとっちゃ、宝の山なんだけどね。
